website_summaries.verdict: This sleek stand will meet the needs of anyone looking for a reliable product at an affordable price.
pros: Stylish wire frame with a sturdy base
Elevates the book to support customer posture
A fantastic choice for tall cooks
Simple design of stand looks great in any kitchen space
The negative space of the product doesn't break cookbook spines

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand, but too small for thick cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: I got this stand for my husband who had received "The Joy of Cooking" for the holidays. He liked the look and height of the stand, but because the page holders are not that far from the stand itself, the book could only be placed on the stand if it was opened in the middle. Since the entire book has recipes, this was not feasible and we had to return the stand. If you don't have thick cookbooks, this stand is very nice. If you *have* thick cookbooks like "The Joy of Cooking", you will need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Aeryn S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small amount of counter space, and always have trouble using cookbooks and having to keep them away from the cooking action so they don't get wet, and then running back and forth to read instructions and then returning to tend to the food. This cookbook stand is WONDERFUL. It is very sturdy, I love the height and angle that it provides. It's actually practical for using while cooking, because you can easily read the page. It's heavy and doesn't tip. I also enjoy just having my favorite cookbook open on the counter now, or inspiration for what the next dinner is going to be. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different types of cookbook racks at the same time. I am 76 years old and never had a rack so figured I earned two! I like the plastic fold up one better. This one takes up too much space on my limited counter and no really good place to store it. Therefore it is in the original box and will be a present to someone. This is a good looking stand and for someone who wants it to look "important" go for it. But it is not really practical.
customer_reviews.author: sassysenior

customer_reviews.title: This rack is great. I was a little unsure from the pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: This rack is great. I was a little unsure from the pictures about how big it would be in person, but once I got it it's a perfect size. It keeps books high enough off a surface so that if you spill something the book won't get wet, but it's not too tall. When I'm not using it for cooking I display a cocktail book in it on top of my liquor cabinet, which looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: POUUER

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase decision all year :-)
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best purchase I have made all year! I keep it out on my counter with the cookbook open to the next recipe I anticipate making. It looks great & doesn't take up a lot of room (I am a clutter freak) . Perfect size & weight and serves a really important purpose.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mellott

customer_reviews.title: Helps your neck when constantly checking recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great, but the other reviews were correct. If you have a larger cookbook you will not be able to use the recipes in the beginning or very end because of the metal brackets meant to hold the pages down. Also wish it came in other finishes.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Love the height of this book stand
customer_reviews.text: Love the height of this book stand! Unfortunately, the one I received is crooked so the clean modern look I was hoping for turned out to look kind of janky. Still, with a book on it, it's pretty good and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple cook books and tablets that we use in the kitchen for cooking and this keeps them elevated and dry. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Karkhoff

customer_reviews.title: A Kitchen Essential For People Who Like To Cook
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new VonShef Cookbook stand. It's built very well and holds most any size cookbooks. I spend a lot of time in the kitchen and using this cookbook stand takes the stress off my neck from looking down to the kitchen counter to read my recipes. I believe that anyone who uses cookbooks will be very pleased with this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Louraine Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use it all the time for holding my cookbooks up and open. Only drawback was that the base doesn't have a material on it to cushion it on the counter. I added a few clear "picture frame rubber bumpers: on the base. It's a keeper! :)
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile - two sheet recipes on 8 1/2 x 11, or recipe cards, or a pretty thick cookbook
customer_reviews.text: If you want a stand that can handle one or two sheet recipes on 8 1/2 x 11, or recipe cards, or a pretty thick cookbook, this is the one!!! I don't write many reviews, but this was one of my wife's favorite decisions I made this year. I looked all of the other stands on Amazon and they all do one of the above, but usually only one of them. I like the versatility of this one. It is made of sturdy material and it was in use the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Alan on the hill

customer_reviews.title: Vonshelf cook book stand is a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of a messy cook.This book/iPad stand fits my needs. It keeps the book off of the counter at a good reading height and angle. I place a clear lexan sheet over the pages to protect the paper while I am cooking. This stand may accommodate up to a maximum thickness of 1.5 inches when using it for a cook book.The stand looks like it is partially hand fabricated and may have slight manufacturing deviations. So keep that in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: monica r. hunter

customer_reviews.title: The size of books it can hold its important to me
customer_reviews.text: The Internet picture was absolutely misleading. This cookbook holder can only "hold" thin books. It would have helped if this information and the measurements were provided to make an informed decision prior to ordering. I returned it the same day I received the order. Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Susana Braun

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cookbook Stand!
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook stand is perfect! It gets the book off the counter and is easier to see the recipes, thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this cookbook stand!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! It can hold a paperback or hardback book open with ease. I especially like that it raises the book up off the counter making it easier to view recipes as well as clearing counter space. It's an interesting design as well so is pleasing to the eye when just sitting on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook holder. It gets my books or recipe pages up off of the counter, and the angle makes reading the recipes much easier. Also helps them stay clean!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect cookbook stand
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect cookbook stand, I have tried 3 others and my books would always either fall off or tip the stand over. It is very well made and looks good on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Benbow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rack is nicely made, works wonderful holding all sizes of books, and the elevated feature is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickey

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook rest ever!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! What a great design. You can't knock it over when you move it. The angle is perfect for reading recipes. It looks great on the counter. It holds the pages open and supports the entire book.
customer_reviews.author: WorldGypsyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: How did I get along without one. It raises the cookbook up high enough to allow more use of the counterspace. It holds a variety of cookbooks of different sizes and thicknesses. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: R. Seger

customer_reviews.title: Chef stand
customer_reviews.text: Just what the chef wanted. He's pleased. Very durable, fits in kitchen with out being too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! love this, makes reading my cookbooks so easy and making less marks on my cookbooks!, I place some of my other cookbooks on the back to hold them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mistyspau4

customer_reviews.title: Holds my paperback great.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong well made book holder. I only wish it angled a little more up right. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: NAME_Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It is nice, works well
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of cookbook stands and this seems the answer to my small kitchen counter space. It is nice, works well. Looks a little strange on the counter but we'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: DrMaryMargaret

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: The cookbooks are out of the mess with this very easy to clean book stand. Classy looking...a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Dittmar

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This stand works great for cookbooks. This works great to keep the book open to the recipe that is wanted or as a cute book display. I've been very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Well made, affordable and beautiful. Holds large cookbooks, magazines, tablets or printed recipes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and well-made cookbook stand. Works well with my heaviest cookbooks or recipes I printed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Slater

customer_reviews.title: Great product, you won't regret the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with how well the stand is made. It has perfect angle to hold the books open ultimately making them very easy to read and follow the recipes. I was hesitating between this stand and upright acrylic one but because of the way they hold the books I went with this one and very happy with my purchase. I can also see it being utilized as a music sheet stand, may be.
customer_reviews.author: Gosha

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great look. I bought this as a gift for a friend and she is able to use it with all of her cookbooks.
customer_reviews.author: cnw76

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received product. Clearly had been damaged, repaired inadequately and re-shipped. Two areas had been tack welded, not straight and leaving some sharp edges of bar steel exposed. Really poor workmanship in the first place, followed up by even worse repair workmanship. I will spend a little more to find something that won't wind up in recycling bin in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Craig N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great use it at work
customer_reviews.text: Works great use it at work , our book stays off the counter and stays nice and clean also in one spot so everyone can find it when needed.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love that is is raised, at an angle, and will hold pages in place. Great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: use it everyday wish it would fit a little bit ...

customer_reviews.title: Great stand. This has made my cooking so much ...

customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his gift. And our friends and family keep commenting on it. It sits on our counter and looks grand. Works well with different sized cook books as well as sheets we've printed from the net. Super cool!

customer_reviews.text: This stand is sturdy, attractive and holds my book at perfect viewing angle. I use it to hold cocktail recipe books on my bar. I highly recommend it to hold any books, be it for studying, making cocktails or cooking.

customer_reviews.text: Love this recipe stand! Makes the whole process so much easier and pleasant. Sounds kind of silly but really does make a difference!

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely design! I keep it on my counter at all times with an open cookbook! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley H

customer_reviews.title: VonShef rated #1
customer_reviews.text: VonShef Wire Cookbook Stand is my first and only choice. I've ordered and returned 3 other books stands that did not do the job. First of all, the book needs support behind it to stay open! The VonShef does that and also elevates the book so I keep my posture straight. It's attractive and looks great on my granite counter top. I use it to hold my cook books open and hold my library book open so I can read while I'm eating. Well tested and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: lapdance

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER COOK BOOK STAND
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen, I believe they call it a Galley kitchen. With the cookbook stand, the way it is made, I can move it all around me with the cook book. The stand is sturdy! At the top where you put your cookbook, its not small and holds the pages in place. It is the best. This cookbook stand can be used in any size kitchen, and, I bet it would be wonderful in a motor home. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cooking Partner
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been taping copied book pages to my cabinet doors; while I will still probably do that when I'm working on several recipes at once, this cookbook stand has made working a recipe so much easier for me. I love that it elevates the book off the counter, leaving more room for the cook, and it's a back, neck, and time saver. This stand is solid and elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Crazy

customer_reviews.title: A great solution!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! You would have laughed at seeing me trying to prop up my cookbooks with gallon jugs of water before this arrived. It has solved so many of my issues in the kitchen. It doesn't take up much space, and firmly holds the pages open. It's high enough for me to easily read the recipe, and I'm tall. Even my husband thinks it is a good investment, and he's not always thrilled with the dollars I spend. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl  Madden

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy with a very clean design
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. It's sturdy with a very clean design. Lifts the book / receipe up, which makes better viewing, for me. There is a design on the back of the book stand. This design allow for placement of single receipe sheets or cards , without falling thru. Perfect for holding my tablet, as well. I would order it again. The price was minimal for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I do the majority of my shopping on amazon, so for me to say this is a big deal, but I am happier with this product than any other I have purchased. It is by far the best cookbook stand I have ever used or seen. It fits perfectly on top of my kitchen cart. What is really special, no more bending over to look at the recipe. This is awesome, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and functional. The stand looks great and hold all different sizes of books and magazines or tablets. It is ackward to store because it is somewhat large but looks great sitting out with a nice cookbook on it too. Very happy with the purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: love this. I use it all the time. It fits most of my cookbooks. The thicker books won't fit but I but the ledge in between the pages.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The stand is tall enough to have the recipes at eye level. It is sturdy, keeps the pages of the book or recipe printouts in one secure place and the stand can also hold the iPad. I am very happy with this buy!

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability! I use this for placing in a basket for reading while stationary biking, works like a charm, very strong piece of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A superb design!
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny kitchen. This cookbook stand is ideal in a cramped space because it lifts the book up, leaving room beneath for all those incidental tools and ingredients that accumulate on the counter while cooking/baking. Also, if you need reading glasses (I do) or even if you don't, the elevation keeps the book within easy reading range. No bending or squinting. I have to wonder why no one else thought of this (or, if they did, why I couldn't find it). And the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Kris G

customer_reviews.title: Hey most unique book stand
customer_reviews.text: Hey very clever design that works well with all reading materials and gets clearance underneath too.

product_meta.title: VonShef Wire Cookbook Stand Menu Rack Rest Cooking Book Holder, Silver
product_meta.description:
VonShef Wire Book Rack 

This VonShef Wire Book Rack is the perfect addition to any kitchen.

It can be used for holding cooking / recipe books for those messy baking sessions so the recipe can be read hands free.

The contemporary and stylish wire frame design fits into any modern home and means the rack is ideal as a menu holder/display in restaurants, cafes and bars alike.

A great addition to any household or business.

Dimensions:

Height of the unit: 9.6”

Recipe Book Stand: 7.5” (H) x 11.2” (W)
feature_bullets: Elegant and contemporary VonShef Wire Book Rack
Suitable for books of all sizes
Can also be used to display menus, pricing books, books, magazines or tablets.
Lightweight and stylish frame, but with a sturdy base

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
